page.title: 12Heanton Parish Church.
page.content: When{William the Conqueror}took over England he took over{Heanton manor,} and one of his followers became it's lord. One of his descendants built{St. {Augustine's church.}The present vicar of the church has a variety of jobs e.g the parstoral care of people in the parish.This means visiting the sick, and marrying people,conducting funerals,baptisms etc.The hopes of the Reverand are that people continue to go to church and live in a Christian way.He fears that man trusts too much in himself, that he sees little need for God who can do so much for him.The church receives quite a few visitors, especially in the mornings, although this tends to be more from historical interest, rather than from a religious point of view.
